description:
The newly-released live-action remake of Disney’s Snow White has finally hit theaters. As many suspected, however, the film is underperforming at the box office. Now the son of Snow White producer Marc Platt, Jonah Platt, has taken the opportunity to blast Rachel Zegler as the reason for the film’s failure. It was recently reported that [...]

The post Son Of ‘Snow White’ Producer Blasts Rachel Zegler appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Son Of ‘Snow White’ Producer Blasts Rachel Zegler

description:
With streaming services in a constant search for content, many exclusives are made based on existing IPs. Now one such Amazon Prime Video series, based on a very popular movie, has been canceled after one season on the platform. While the 1999 feature film counterpart has been quite popular for decades, having been worthwhile enough [...]

The post Amazon Prime Video Cancels Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Amazon Prime Video Cancels Series After One Season
